Welcome to \n Plastic Diary
Save the planet
Our aim is to encourage users into pro-environmental behaviour through visualizing the effects of plastic waste through statistics, videos and more.
Learn and improve
Educate yourself on best and sustainable practices on the use of plastics: which to reuse, how to reuse and how to dispose them off properly.
Smart recycling
You\'ll recycling points in the country on a map and the closest ones to you will be highlighted
You just took the first of a collaborative effort to save the planet
Choose the time at which to receive notifications of general tips or to make an entry of plastics used today.

Users will get points (5) for reading a news item, research paper, watching a video, taking a quiz or making an entry in “the diary”. The accumulated points will add up and show in the leaderboard which will be divided into weekly and all time. Top 2 users at the end of the week are verified on the app.

string.name: how_it_works_2
string.br: Users will earn badges when they reach a certain number of views for a content or activity. E.g. A user will earn a badge for watching 5 videos, 10, 20, 50, 10 etc. Same for news items, articles etc. Users will be able to share their badges to the internet.

Food is a hot commodity! If we produce food that doesn\’t get eaten, what else is wasted?

It\'s actually 30%. About a third of the food produced on the planet goes to waste. Waste happens in every link of our food supply chain—from the fruit that never makes it off the farm to the vegetables you forgot were in your fridge.
